TopicTitle: You know you haven't play KSP too much when...

Articles.Content:
You still call the Mun, "Moon".

Your turn! Celebrating that you haven't play the game so much that you experience[Game Transfer Phenomena](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tetris_effect#Game_transfer_phenomena) yet!
I dream about building SSTOs, I'm out of this one :/
You can watch a youtube video without trying to change the camera viewpoint by dragging the right mouse button.

> 
> You can watch a youtube video without trying to change the camera viewpoint by dragging the right mouse button.

HA! I do this!
When you acctually stop thinking about your future rockets and satellites. I can't.

> 
> You can watch a youtube video without trying to change the camera viewpoint by dragging the right mouse button.

That leaves me out.. I do this all the time!
